letters.description: Validate the traumatic experience and identify its pervasive impact on the client's current psychological functioning.
Utilize psychoeducation to de-stigmatize symptoms as adaptive, natural survival responses to unnatural events.
Implement somatic grounding and regulation techniques to stabilize the autonomic nervous system and manage triggers.
Facilitate the processing of the trauma story at a safe pace, emphasizing survivor agency and emotional release.
Develop sustainable coping strategies and cognitive reframing tools to enhance emotional regulation and stability.
Foster post-traumatic growth by integrating the past into a self-determined, empowered, and resilient future identity.
